muted.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: muted sounds, voices etc are quieter than usual
muted.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Everyone was sitting round discussing the accident in muted voices.
muted.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a muted reaction to something is not expressed strongly
muted.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: There was muted agreement from most of the people in the room.
The speech received only a muted response from the unions.
muted.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a muted colour or light is soft and gentle, not bright
muted.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a muted musical instrument has been made to sound softer
